alias of Member_members

members.models module¶

class members.models.Member(*args, **kwargs)¶

Member objects are used to unify and abstract away from the internal entity of parts of our organization.

Members can be Observers, LCs, Junior LCs, International Teams or Bodies of the association. The goal using these objects is to unify the way how we handle interactions that are common to all five kinds of parts of eestec

When Members are created first, a local event called Recruitment is automatically created. By applying to event, registered users can become part of one or more members.

slug = None¶

The type of the Member

thumbsource = None¶

The picture that should appear in the Member list

description = None¶

LC info text

facebook = None¶

Facebook page for the member

members¶

The Users who are considered to be part of the Member

priviledged¶

The priviledged Users of the Member, they are able to make changes.

board¶

The board of the Member

founded = None¶

When the Member was first established

member_count()¶

The amount of members currently in the Member

last_event()¶

The date of the last Event organized by the Member

class members.models.MemberImage(*args, **kwargs)¶

Helper class used to associate an arbitrary number of images with a Member
